Bob reused a prime when generating two RSA keys. Eve intercepted the encrypted flag: 442485575668007171625026190596021283814448920141900042219424067443710953852254766228459492830374699583635564216111396011938385199845595208074313228901837726544445970983611982068294315365285116913158616381286654753840723107974175113. Can you recover the plaintext?

The flag format is flag{...}
n=457779034942846871704789144253723817626529787252281390382208634529375449214571307618269614560902468668412754488551224814863458299335677543238320155294903973706552933491847638182810835138328440812053140195377098341229366380180908969, e=112977724761088745224693942079242105330889467626288683542777659711568576955964564840611124117005391977709562553569427763992148677359655776257690602811105492185206679468964663888471552187784319726908606106605063598262193597907236237

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{fyjkp8qo}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 442485575668007171625026190596021283814448920141900042219424067443710953852254766228459492830374699583635564216111396011938385199845595208074313228901837726544445970983611982068294315365285116913158616381286654753840723107974175113
vulnerability: repeated primes
hint: The RSA modulus n is a perfect square. This often indicates a repeated prime usage vulnerability.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=457779034942846871704789144253723817626529787252281390382208634529375449214571307618269614560902468668412754488551224814863458299335677543238320155294903973706552933491847638182810835138328440812053140195377098341229366380180908969, e=112977724761088745224693942079242105330889467626288683542777659711568576955964564840611124117005391977709562553569427763992148677359655776257690602811105492185206679468964663888471552187784319726908606106605063598262193597907236237
extra_info: p=21395771426682583433117744134909627907376380326812260793680305732345974437444070838508706812093306404090367824407437, q=21395771426682583433117744134909627907376380326812260793680305732345974437444070838508706812093306404090367824407437, Ï†(n)=457779034942846871704789144253723817626529787252281390382208634529375449214571307618269614560902468668412754488551182023320604934168811307750050336039089220945899308970260277571346143189453552670376122781752911728421185644532094096
subtype: repeated_prime_usage
archetype: rsa
